item.description:
Meet up with The Most Informal Running Club Ever for the weekly Saturday Fun Run. We'll split up into groups depending on the turnout for distance and time goals for 4, 6 or 7 mile loops. It's your choice!

What to expect: a seriously fun group of runners who definitely do not take running too seriously . We will meet, chat, RUN, stretch, chat, EAT BREAKFAST and then leave. It's that easy.

Breakfast Details : Between 11:15 and 11:30 (depending on how long we run) we will meet back at CITY SPORTS Comm Ave. for breakfast.

Feel free to contribute a great breakfast item to share with the group (eggs, bagels, fruits, muffins, juice, bacon, potatoes, etc.) You're not obligated to bring anything, though, so please join us for breakfast after the run anyway.

ALL ABILITY LEVELS ARE WELCOME!!!

Meter parking is easily accessible on Comm Ave. and also Gardner St. which runs parallel behind the store. The B train on the Green Line stops directly across from the store at Babcock St.

CITY SPORTS is located near the intersection of Commonwealth Ave. and Babcock St.

View City Sports in a larger map

item.name: TMIRCE Saturdays @ City Sports Informal Run + Breakfast
